<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="GetDomainsFilter" data-link-title="GetDomainsFilter">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L910">
        interface <strong>GetDomainsFilter</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>GetDomainsFilter</span></code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDomainsFilter-all">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L916">property <b>all</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>all?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

Set to `true` to require that a field match all of the `values` instead of just one or more of
them. This is useful when matching against multi-valued fields such as lists or sets where you want to ensure
that all of the `values` are present in the list or set.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDomainsFilter-key">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L920">property <b>key</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Filter the domains by this key. This may be one of `name`, `urn`, and `ttl`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDomainsFilter-matchBy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L926">property <b>matchBy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>matchBy?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

One of `exact` (default), `re`, or `substring`. For string-typed fields, specify `re` to
match by using the `values` as regular expressions, or specify `substring` to match by treating the `values` as
substrings to find within the string field.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDomainsFilter-values">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L931">property <b>values</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>values: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>[];</code></pre>

A list of values to match against the `key` field. Only retrieves domains
where the `key` field takes on one or more of the values provided here.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="GetDomainsSort" data-link-title="GetDomainsSort">

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="GetDropletsFilter" data-link-title="GetDropletsFilter">

        interface <strong>GetDropletsFilter</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>GetDropletsFilter</span></code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDropletsFilter-all">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1048">property <b>all</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>all?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

Set to `true` to require that a field match all of the `values` instead of just one or more of
them. This is useful when matching against multi-valued fields such as lists or sets where you want to ensure
that all of the `values` are present in the list or set.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDropletsFilter-key">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1055">property <b>key</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Filter the Droplets by this key. This may be one of `backups`, `createdAt`, `disk`, `id`,
`image`, `ipv4Address`, `ipv4AddressPrivate`, `ipv6`, `ipv6Address`, `ipv6AddressPrivate`, `locked`,
`memory`, `monitoring`, `name`, `priceHourly`, `priceMonthly`, `privateNetworking`, `region`, `size`,
`status`, `tags`, `urn`, `vcpus`, `volumeIds`, or `vpcUuid`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDropletsFilter-matchBy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1061">property <b>matchBy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>matchBy?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

One of `exact` (default), `re`, or `substring`. For string-typed fields, specify `re` to
match by using the `values` as regular expressions, or specify `substring` to match by treating the `values` as
substrings to find within the string field.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetDropletsFilter-values">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1066">property <b>values</b></a>

A list of values to match against the `key` field. Only retrieves Droplets
where the `key` field takes on one or more of the values provided here.

that all of the `values` are present in the list or set.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetImagesFilter-key">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1095">property <b>key</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Filter the images by this key. This may be one of `distribution`, `errorMessage`,
`id`, `image`, `minDiskSize`, `name`, `private`, `regions`, `sizeGigabytes`, `slug`, `status`,
`tags`, or `type`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetImagesFilter-matchBy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1101">property <b>matchBy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>matchBy?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

One of `exact` (default), `re`, or `substring`. For string-typed fields, specify `re` to
match by using the `values` as regular expressions, or specify `substring` to match by treating the `values` as
substrings to find within the string field.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetImagesFilter-values">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1106">property <b>values</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>values: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>[];</code></pre>

A list of values to match against the `key` field. Only retrieves images
where the `key` field takes on one or more of the values provided here.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetImagesImage-private">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1136">property <b>private</b></a>

Is image a public image or not. Public images represent
Linux distributions or One-Click Applications, while non-public images represent
snapshots and backups and are only available within your account.
- `regions`: A set of the regions that the image is available in.
- `tags`: A set of tags applied to the image
- `created`: When the image was created
- `status`: Current status of the image
- `errorMessage`: Any applicable error message pertaining to the image

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetKubernetesClusterNodePool-nodes">

    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>GetProjectsFilter</span></code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetProjectsFilter-all">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1290">property <b>all</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>all?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

Set to `true` to require that a field match all of the `values` instead of just one or more of
them. This is useful when matching against multi-valued fields such as lists or sets where you want to ensure
that all of the `values` are present in the list or set.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetProjectsFilter-key">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1295">property <b>key</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Filter the projects by this key. This may be one of `name`,
`purpose`, `description`, `environment`, or `isDefault`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetProjectsFilter-matchBy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1301">property <b>matchBy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>matchBy?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

One of `exact` (default), `re`, or `substring`. For string-typed fields, specify `re` to
match by using the `values` as regular expressions, or specify `substring` to match by treating the `values` as
substrings to find within the string field.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetProjectsFilter-values">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1306">property <b>values</b></a>
</h4>

A list of values to match against the `key` field. Only retrieves projects
where the `key` field takes on one or more of the values provided here.

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>GetRecordsFilter</span></code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetRecordsFilter-all">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1371">property <b>all</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>all?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

Set to `true` to require that a field match all of the `values` instead of just one or more of
them. This is useful when matching against multi-valued fields such as lists or sets where you want to ensure
that all of the `values` are present in the list or set.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetRecordsFilter-key">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1376">property <b>key</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Filter the DNS records by this key. This may be one of `domain`, `flags`, `name`, `port`,
`priority`, `tag`, `ttl`, `type`, `value`, or `weight`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetRecordsFilter-matchBy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1382">property <b>matchBy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>matchBy?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

One of `exact` (default), `re`, or `substring`. For string-typed fields, specify `re` to
match by using the `values` as regular expressions, or specify `substring` to match by treating the `values` as
substrings to find within the string field.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetRecordsFilter-values">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1387">property <b>values</b></a>

A list of values to match against the `key` field. Only retrieves DNS records
where the `key` field takes on one or more of the values provided here.

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Sort the regions by this key. This may be one of `slug`,
`name`, or `available`.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="GetSizesFilter" data-link-title="GetSizesFilter">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1479">
        interface <strong>GetSizesFilter</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>GetSizesFilter</span></code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesFilter-all">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1485">property <b>all</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>all?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

Set to `true` to require that a field match all of the `values` instead of just one or more of
them. This is useful when matching against multi-valued fields such as lists or sets where you want to ensure
that all of the `values` are present in the list or set.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesFilter-key">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1491">property <b>key</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>key: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Filter the sizes by this key. This may be one of `slug`,
`regions`, `memory`, `vcpus`, `disk`, `transfer`, `priceMonthly`,
`priceHourly`, or `available`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesFilter-matchBy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1497">property <b>matchBy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>matchBy?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

One of `exact` (default), `re`, or `substring`. For string-typed fields, specify `re` to
match by using the `values` as regular expressions, or specify `substring` to match by treating the `values` as
substrings to find within the string field.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesFilter-values">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1502">property <b>values</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>values: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>[];</code></pre>

Only retrieves sizes which keys has value that matches
one of the values provided here.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-available">

</h4>

This represents whether new Droplets can be created with this size.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-disk">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1513">property <b>disk</b></a>
</h4>

The amount of disk space set aside for Droplets of this size. The value is measured in gigabytes.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-memory">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1517">property <b>memory</b></a>

The amount of RAM allocated to Droplets created of this size. The value is measured in megabytes.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-priceHourly">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1521">property <b>priceHourly</b></a>

The hourly cost of Droplets created in this size as measured hourly. The value is measured in US dollars.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-priceMonthly">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1525">property <b>priceMonthly</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>priceMonthly: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>;</code></pre>

The monthly cost of Droplets created in this size if they are kept for an entire month. The value is measured in US dollars.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-regions">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1529">property <b>regions</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-slug">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1533">property <b>slug</b></a>

A human-readable string that is used to uniquely identify each size.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-transfer">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1537">property <b>transfer</b></a>
</h4>

The amount of transfer bandwidth that is available for Droplets created in this size. This only counts traffic on the public interface. The value is given in terabytes.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetSizesSize-vcpus">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetTagsFilter-all">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1650">property <b>all</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>all?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

Set to `true` to require that a field match all of the `values` instead of just one or more of
them. This is useful when matching against multi-valued fields such as lists or sets where you want to ensure
that all of the `values` are present in the list or set.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetTagsFilter-key">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1654">property <b>key</b></a>

Filter the tags by this key. This may be one of `name`, `totalResourceCount`,  `dropletsCount`, `imagesCount`, `volumesCount`, `volumeSnapshotsCount`, or `databasesCount`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetTagsFilter-matchBy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1660">property <b>matchBy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>matchBy?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

One of `exact` (default), `re`, or `substring`. For string-typed fields, specify `re` to
match by using the `values` as regular expressions, or specify `substring` to match by treating the `values` as
substrings to find within the string field.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GetTagsFilter-values">

Only retrieves tags which keys has value that matches
one of the values provided here.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="KubernetesClusterNodePool-nodeCount">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1773">property <b>nodeCount</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>nodeCount?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>;</code></pre>

The number of Droplet instances in the node pool. If auto-scaling is enabled, this should only be set if the desired result is to explicitly reset the number of nodes to this value. If auto-scaling is enabled, and the node count is outside of the given min/max range, it will use the min nodes value.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-responseTimeoutSeconds">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-unhealthyThreshold">

<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1918">property <b>type</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>type?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

An attribute indicating how and if requests from a client will be persistently served by the same backend Droplet. The possible values are `cookies` or `none`. If not specified, the default value is `none`.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="SpacesBucketCorsRule" data-link-title="SpacesBucketCorsRule">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1921">

    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>SpacesBucketCorsRule</span></code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketCorsRule-allowedHeaders">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1925">property <b>allowedHeaders</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>allowedHeaders?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>[];</code></pre>

A list of headers that will be included in the CORS preflight request's `Access-Control-Request-Headers`. A header may contain one wildcard (e.g. `x-amz-*`).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketCorsRule-allowedMethods">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1929">property <b>allowedMethods</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>allowedMethods: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>[];</code></pre>

A list of HTTP methods (e.g. `GET`) which are allowed from the specified origin.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketCorsRule-allowedOrigins">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1933">property <b>allowedOrigins</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>allowedOrigins: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>[];</code></pre>

A list of hosts from which requests using the specified methods are allowed. A host may contain one wildcard (e.g. http://*.example.com).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketCorsRule-maxAgeSeconds">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1937">property <b>maxAgeSeconds</b></a>

The time in seconds that browser can cache the response for a preflight request.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketLifecycleRuleExpiration-date">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1973">property <b>date</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>date?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>;</code></pre>

Specifies the date/time after which you want applicable objects to expire. The argument uses
RFC3339 format, e.g. "2020-03-22T15:03:55Z" or parts thereof e.g. "2019-02-28".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketLifecycleRuleExpiration-days">

Specifies the number of days after object creation when the applicable objects will expire.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketLifecycleRuleExpiration-expiredObjectDeleteMarker">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1982">property <b>expiredObjectDeleteMarker</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>expiredObjectDeleteMarker?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

On a versioned bucket (versioning-enabled or versioning-suspended
bucket), setting this to true directs Spaces to delete expired object delete markers.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="SpacesBucketVersioning" data-link-title="SpacesBucketVersioning">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1992">
        interface <strong>SpacesBucketVersioning</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>SpacesBucketVersioning</span></code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SpacesBucketVersioning-enabled">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-digitalocean/blob/602a6e2073cda323121b63f3727c4e927e088399/sdk/nodejs/types/output.ts#L1997">property <b>enabled</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>enabled?: <span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined'>undefined</a></span> | <span class='kd'>false</span> | <span class='kd'>true</span>;</code></pre>

Enable versioning. Once you version-enable a bucket, it can never return to an unversioned
state. You can, however, suspend versioning on that bucket.
